Job Description: Skills :-    -Familiarity with the ASP.NET framework, SQL Server and  design/architectural patterns (e.g. Model-View-Controller (MVC))  -Knowledge of .NET languages (e.g. C#, Visual Basic .NET) and -    -HTML5/CSS3  -Familiarity with architecture styles/APIs (REST, RPC)  -Javascript  -Understanding of Agile methodologies  -Microsoft Office  -Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills   Job Description   -Develop software to specifications  -Design, code and test multiple software applications  -Enhance existing systems by analysing business objectives, preparing an  action plan and identifying areas for modification and improvement  -Participate in requirements analysis and Understand the business needs of  the organisation  -Test and deploy applications and systems  -Develop documentation throughout the software development life cycle  (SDLC)  -Serve as an expert on applications and provide technical support  -Provide software support  -Review system design for new and existing systems  -Meet user expectations requirements
